title: Fix faulty workflow probe creating empty tickets
description: A workflow probe is creating multiple bug and task tickets that are empty and lack details
making them un-actionable. This task is to investigate the responsible probe (likely 'ticket-workflow-probe.test.js' or similar) and fix its ticket creation logic.
comment: Fixed both ticket-workflow-probe and ticket-creation-probe to use a robust try/catch/finally block. This ensures test tickets are always cleaned up
